mema pulul marga wenasa udesa ema margaya haraha idiwi thibu palam ha bokku 1970 wasaredi shakthimath karath, saba pariwarthanaya warsha 1990 wanathek sidu nowina. 1974 di ewakata siti prawahana amathya lesli gunawardhana mathithuma pulul kala haki wibhawayan pilibada anawaranaya kala athara puththalama sita aruwakalu haraha diwena muhudubada dum riya margaya ehi sthapanaya kara thibu simenthi karmanthashalawe sewaya sadaha thawath dirgha karana ladi.[4] 2007 warshayedi rajaya wisin 2014 wasara wanawita idi kirimata niyamitha mathara - katharagama ( kilomitara 113 ), padukka - hambanthota - rathnapuraya ( kilomitara 210 ), kurunagala-dambaulla-habarana ( kilomitara 80 ) ha panadura-horana ( kilomitara 18 ) marga pilibada salasum idiripath kalaha.[5]
